mapper.insert: insert into cost_prform (id, formcdoe, formtype, dept, supplier, delivery, originator, totalprice, signflag, flag, creatdate) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{formcdoe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delivery,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{signflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{creatdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update cost_prform set formcdoe = #{formcdoe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, formtype = #{formtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept = #{dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier = #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery = #{delivery,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, originator = #{originator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totalprice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, signflag = #{signflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR}, creatdate = #{creatdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, formcdoe, formtype, dept, supplier, delivery, originator, totalprice, signflag, flag, creatdate from cost_prform where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, formcdoe, formtype, dept, supplier, delivery, originator, totalprice, signflag, flag, creatdate from cost_prform
